title: Chiral Separation Techniques - A Practical Approach 2nd ed
description:
Chiral Separation Techniques - A Practical Approach 2nd ed - G. Subramanian (Wiley-VCH, 2001).pdf

This is a completely revised and updated sequel to 'A Practical Approach to Chiral Separations by Liquid Chromatography' by the same editor. The scope has been extended to further chiral separation techniques like electrophoresis, membrane separations, or biological assays. More emphasis is put on preparative separation techniques
From reviews of the previous edition:
"A team of experts from academic and industrial laboratories throughout the world have compiled their findings and experience to make this book an exceptionally timely and unique contribution to the field" --European Journal of Drug Metabolis

"The dense mass of information contained in this book will make it a valuable resource..." --Chemical Engineering Researc "... this is a worthwhile addition to the expanding chiral literature and the book should be of value to those working in this field" --The Analyst
